skillTree.localised_description: Each victory reinvigorates Khorne's champions to seek more bloodshed.

effects.description: Replenishes 20% campaign movement range after winning a battle
Replenishes 10% campaign movement range after razing a settlement
Replenishes 30% campaign movement range after winning a battle
Replenishes 20% campaign movement range after razing a settlement

skillTree.localised_description: The followers of Chaos need not to rest, they march on with iron hearts desperate to harvest souls.
This Lord speaks with a dread booming voice - a gift from his Dark Masters to ensure obedience.
At times, this servant of Khorne storms across the battlefield with arrows lodged in his chest. However, they seem to do little but further stoke the raging fire of his wrath.
Few magics can worm their way through this one's skull; their Khornate collar offers adequate protection, as does the impenetrable, relentless fury infecting his mind.
Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +15% of experience earned between all other active Lords

Character experience gain: +20%
	(Heroes in Lord's army)
Character will share +30% of experience earned between all other active Lords

Character experience gain: +35%
	(Heroes in Lord's army)
Character will share +50% of experience earned between all other active Lords

Character experience gain: +50%
	(Heroes in Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: The Warripper’s blade sings its murderous tune louder with every life it claims, each kill fueling a frenzy that surpasses mortal comprehension. Those near him fall in a crimson tide as the Blood God’s thirst fuels his every strike. The taste of carnage drives him into an unstoppable dance of death.

ui_effects.localised_text: Activates when an enemy unit is destroyed within 30 metres

skillTree.localised_name: For the World to Dictate Our Death
skillTree.localised_description: As loyal clanrats and stormvermin bleed their last in service to Khorne, their fleeting lives become fuel for the Warripper’s vitality. His body absorbs their sacrifice, binding sinew and mending scars with unholy vigor. Each fallen ally strengthens his ties to the God of Blood and unrelenting carnage.

effects.description: Ability: "For the World to Dictate Our Death"

unit_ability.onscreen_name: For the World to Dictate Our Death

ui_effects.localised_text: Effect intensity increases with each nearby allied entity death.

skillTree.localised_description: The flight of craven foes swells the Warripper’s presence with doom incarnate, their despair breaking the spirit of those still foolish enough to stand their ground. His aura spreads as a storm of hopeless dread, consuming resolve with every fleeing back. The battlefield becomes a feast of terror and desperation that none can escape.

ui_effects.localised_text: Effect intensity increases by each enemy unit in range with leadership wavering or lower.

skillTree.localised_description: Enemy champions who meet the Warripper’s gaze are driven to madness, their minds ripped apart by the bloodlust he embodies. They lash out blindly, consumed by their own fury, while their strength and skill crumble to nothing. Such is Khorne’s will - to turn foes into instruments of their own undoing.

target_if: Unit is a Lord or Hero

attributes.bullet_text:
A Rampaging unit is uncontrollable and will attack the nearest enemy unit.
	When there are no enemy units nearby, a Rampaging unit will move around randomly instead.

skillTree.localised_description: Bathed in a tide of gore and unholy fire, the Warripper becomes an avatar of the Blood God, unyielding and eternal. Wounds that should end a mortal only empower him, as Khorne’s infernal blessing strengthens his unrelenting rampage. He fights with the certainty of divine favor, knowing his path leads only to glory or death.

Every soul carved from its mortal tether deepens the Warripper's violent devotion, his presence unraveling even the most stalwart defenses. The cries of the slain embolden his already gruesome instincts, spreading Khorne's hatred with every swing of his cursed weapon. Against him, even the greatest protections falter, shattered by divine malice.
The Warriors of Chaos are the playthings of Gods and given many gifts, including formidable fighting skills.
Some creatures charge home with such fury that the very ground shakes beneath their feet.
Creatures with tough hides or some kind of natural armour are tough nuts to crack - even a powerful attack may fall foul of their thick-skin.
Hand-to-hand combat is a lethal match of cut and thrust. However, it’s not all about offensive strikes; parries and other defensive moves can also win the day.
A deadly blade is especially lethal when in the hands of this master death-maker, killer and slaughterer!
From one bloodied, lifeless corpse to the next, this one is always looking for the next adversary to best.
Such is their power and ferocity, a wound-maker will ravage the foe, cutting and pulverising until there is only one exit - death.
The scars on this storied warrior reveal a veteran of many battles, a being not easy to kill and one worthy of respect and fear.
The iron will and indomitable presence of this leader ensures their followers remain steadfast when facing peril.
A blade that sings in defence will not let its wielder be penetrated.
The war is endless. The cycle of charging, clashing, and bloody hand-to-hand fighting is without end. It will never stop.
There are Lords that radiate power, confidence and fear, inspiring their followers to great or terrible acts.

effects.description:
Unit experience gain per turn: +75
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: To rise above the rank and file, to claw one's way above the mire and the filth, takes a certain, superior breed of Skaven.

skillTree.localised_description: Is it better to be respected or feared? What sort of question is that... why, both of course!

skillTree.localised_description: This one has seen the hideous deformities created by Clan Moulder firsthand and now fancies himself a dab hand with a needle and thread…

skillTree.localised_description: Potions infused with Warpstone transmogrify the not-always-willing testbed subjects; those who survive the process emerge stronger and better in every way.

skillTree.localised_description: Those who know the land and its secrets will travel faster and further than the foes who don't.
Those that excel as looters make sure that every coin or gold tooth is found and added to the plunder. Woe betide the warrior that misses even a single copper token!
Such long-lived creatures develop a level of guile that mortals cannot match.
The Lords rule, the peasants toil. Nothing has changed in over a thousand years.
Keeping on top of things with an iron fist prevents Skavendom from becoming too much of a degenerate mess.
Naturally, rats get in everywhere – even the tiniest opening presents little obstacle – spreading their disease and corruption everywhere they can.
Someone has to ensure the numbers and quality of recruits remain high.
"The time to strike is now!"

effects.description: Reinforcements supporting this army can have their arrival point adjusted by +250 metres without incurring any time penalty
Reinforcements supporting this army can have their arrival point adjusted by +600 metres without incurring any time penalty
Enables lightning strike battles when reinforcements are present
Reinforcements supporting this army can have their arrival point adjusted by +1000 metres without incurring any time penalty

skillTree.localised_description: A good quartermaster can ration equipment and foodstuffs efficiently, making supplies last longer.
This warrior has been ambushed previously and got themselves and many of their compatriots away safely. Such things make one naturally suspicious.
When making corpses of your foes, leave nothing of value for their kin to recover.

effects.description: Post battle chance of stealing a magic item: +5%
Post battle chance of stealing a magic item: +10%
Post battle chance of stealing a magic item: +15%

skillTree.localised_description: This Lord's many deeds - both on and off the battlefield - have brought them renown among their allies and made them feared by their enemies.

effects.description: Hero self-defence: +25% chance of wounding aggressors

attributes.bullet_text: This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.

A unit with the Mark of Khorne has:
	➕ Frenzy Passive Ability
	➕ Increased  Spell Resistance
	➕ Increased  Armour
	➖ Reduced  Melee Defence

enabled_if: Leadership is higher than 50% of base

attributes.bullet_text: The unit is immune to psychological attacks (Fear & Terror).

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Oh, horrific wonder! Vile awe! Such hateful majesty!

related_attributes.bullet_text: This unit frightens all enemy units, reducing their leadership when nearby. It is also immune to fear. Fear penalties do not stack.
This unit can cause terror, making its melee target rout for a short time. Units that cause terror are immune to terror and fear themselves.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: The champion is surrounded by crackling flames that burn his enemies whilst leaving his own body untouched.
Fatigue is no issue when one is driven by the darkest rage imaginable.
Those blessed by Chaos see not only what is before them, but also what lurks in shadow, hiding in the periphery.
The champion has been rewarded with a hideous appearance, grotesque enough to wither the hearts of men.

related_attributes.bullet_text: This unit can cause terror, making its melee target rout for a short time. Units that cause terror are immune to terror and fear themselves.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Granted skin as strong as iron plate, there is little that can penetrate the champion's defences.
The champion's skin is covered with a thousand reptilian scales, each as tough as Dragonhide.
Some are blessed by a dark understanding, able to gleam knowledge from every experience.

effects.description:
Unit experience gain per turn: +25
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: A foe may strike fast, but those evolved by Chaos move faster still.
